description: Number of primes = 1 mod 3 dividing n.
comments: The first instance of a(n)=2 is for n=91; the first instance of a(n)=3 is for n=1729.  1729 is famously Ramanujan's taxi cab number -- see A001235. - _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 25 2013
links: S. R. Finch and Pascal Sebah, Squares and Cubes Modulo n (arXiv:math.NT/0604465).
formula: Additive with a(p^e) = 1 if p = 1 (mod 3), 0 otherwise.
crossrefs: Cf. A121940 (first number having n such factors).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
